Package javax.xml.bind.util

Useful client utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JAXBResult JAXP Result implementation that unmarshals a JAXB object.
JAXBSource JAXP Source implementation that marshals a JAXB-generated object.
ValidationEventCollector ValidationEventHandler implementation that collects all events.

Useful client utility classes.
